name: cms
description: A REST API and admin portal

scripts.db-make: docker run --name stem-c-db-dev -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_DB=strapi -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -v /var/lib/postgresql/data -d postgres
scripts.db-bash: docker exec -it stem-c-db-dev psql strapi postgres
scripts.build-frontend: rm -rf ./public/frontend/* && cd ../client && env PUBLIC_URL=/frontend yarn build && mv ./build/* ../cms/public/frontend
